extendedInfo.description: The 2012 Melbourne Cup app is the perfect guide to this year's Melbourne Cup, and applying historical stats to give you enough information before having a bet.The 2012 includes the following features:* 2012 Melbourne cup race field includes the jockey silk colours, and the form guide of the last 20 races for each horse.* History shows the first 4 place getters back to 1983, and a full list of all winners of the Melbourne Cup.* Statistics on the the number of winners/place getters for variables such as the Age/Sex of the horse, Barrier, Odds, Weight, and will even rank each horse based on these stats.* Tips for different betting options such as Win, Place, Quinella/Exacta, Duet, Trifecta and First 4.* The different betting options are also explained, with a sample illustration of how to fill out a TAB form ticket.

reviews.title: Excellent Stats
reviews.comment: Excellent stats with lots of historical info.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great information 4 Melbourne cup
reviews.comment: Great app, Great information given, sure to pick a winner on the day
reviews.author: A Google User
